about_the_game:
Take on the role of a ruthless tormentor who manages an abandoned prison full of victims sentenced to death.

The Story of Tormentor

Fight against a developing mental illness that takes away your memories and causes more and more frequent and dangerous fainting. Work with an organized criminal group "Cerberus" using darkweb to get more doses of the experimental drug that helps to keep your mind sober.


Your actions are controlled by a mysterious figure called "Hades", who decides which prisoners will be sent to your prison.


MAIN HUB


Explore the prison you control, feed your prisoners and complete various additional activities to unlock terrifying scenes from the hero's life.

Bathing in blood and leeches? Or maybe cutting up a corpse on the kitchen table?

Do you dare to discover all the secrets of Tormentor?


MANHUNT  

Become a hunter and hunt the escapee hiding in an abandoned prison. Make him pay dearly for his escape attempt.

MAIN FEATURES

- Brutal executions

- Interactive "in-game" computer

- Fighting and sneaking in TPP mode

- Receiving donations and new victims from sponsors

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

Recommended:

  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
